body.name: XLR to XLR Cable 10 Feet, Premium XLR Microphone Cable, Heavy Duty 22AWG OFC XLR Male to Female Cord, 3-Pin Shielded Mic Speaker Cable, Zinc Alloy Connectors, Metal Spring SR, White

features: 【Pro-grade Microphone Cable】: Kxable XLR cables feature high-quality 22AWG pure copper wire as the conductor, which is more sturdy and stable than 24/26AWG. Greatly improving the performance of cables. Provide you with a hearing feast with high fidelity sound, no noise and no electrostatic interference.

【Premium Material】: Our XLR to XLR cables use zinc alloy shell that is stronger than aluminum case, providing a more stable connection. Compared with ordinary jacket, our cable uses imported high-elastic pvc which provides stronger protection. The male plug adopts a self-locking connector design, which is easy to pull out, insert, and firmly lock. In addition, the end of the wire adopts a metal spring SR design, making it more flexible and durable, never breaking.

【Copper Braided Balanced Shielded】: Kxable microphone XLR cord has high density Copper Braided shielding and Al-foil shielding can greatly resist EMI/RFI and ensure Hi-Fi audio sound quality. Heavy duty Zinc Alloy Connectors for wireless mic sets. The included 5 cable ties help manage cables in an organized manner.

【Wide Application】: Our XLR cables compatible with equipment has 3-pin connectors. Such as microphone, harmonizer, podcast, digital audio mixer, patch bay, preamplifier, speaker, wireless mic, amplifier, recording studio and more. Great suitable for KTV, Stage Sound, Professional Sound Reinforcement.

【Worry-Free Service】: We offer a one-year warranty for these cables. If you have any questions, please contact us and our professional customer service will reply to you within 24 hours. Meet all your needs. Our cables have multiple color options: White, Green, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Purple, Black (please search for this color in the Kxable Cables ). Various XLR cord lengths: From 1ft to 200ft.
body.description: HI-FI Heavy-Duty XLR Cable Kxable XLR cable features 22AWG pure copper wire as the conductor, which greatly improves the performance of the conductor. Provide you with a hearing feast with high fidelity sound, no noise, high fidelity and no electrostatic interference. Kxable XLR cable uses zinc alloy shells, High-elastic pvc jacket and metal spring SR design (more flexible and durable, never rupture). Self-locking male to female connector design (easy to pull out, insert and firmly lock). These high-quality materials make this XLR cable has HI-FI sound quality and excellent texture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: The cable seems pretty durable and the the sound is great too. Also it is purple, which means it is AMAZING!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For The Musician
reviews.reviewText: Being able to separate a microphone from the base unit is extremely convenient. I am able to do that thanks to this XLR to XLR cable. Good quality and does he job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality cable and connectors with a useful GREEN color!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great buy for the money. I got this cable for my karaoke show because SOMEONE (brother-in-law, I'm looking at you) always likes to cruise the audience and sing to some unsuspecting female (the audience always loves this so I'm not really complaining!)This is an excellent cable, with metal (not PLASTIC!) XLR connectors and metal coils on each end as strain reliefs. The cable is substantial and all components are very high quality. I got the 100 ft one, and it is more than twice as long as my next longest mike cable... but so far, no hum or noise coming from the cable in a cranked-up amplifier. I'm pleased.A reviewer here mentioned a wiring error on the cable that could cause a ground loop or noise, and indeed my cable is wired that way too (pin 1 tied to XLR shell). In my application connecting a microphone to the karaoke amplifier, this doesn't appear to be a problem (I hear no noise at all). On my cable, the wire between pin 1 and the shell contactor could be easily snipped if that caused a problem.Here's something that I love about this cable... it's GREEN! All my other cables are black, but I may buy a couple more cables in different colors. This is because it makes it so easy to associate an input (and input controls) with a given mike, so I can adjust things in real time by color. Such a simple pleasure!I've had this cable in use for about 5 months now and it has held up very well under "road" conditions. It may be my favorite mike cable.Definitely Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value xlr cable. Shielding is of good material and strain reliefs feel sturdy. Flexibility is good. No particular effect on audio quality so overall a great cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and sound quality too
reviews.reviewText: Good thickness and material and sound quality was surprisingly good. I thought it would be your average sounding cable, but actually sounds better then your average cable. Produced more midst and treble on my application. I went back and forth between this 100 ft cable and my cable and this 100 ft cable sounded a bit more clearer then the cable I had before this one. 100ft cable sounded a bit more clearer and midst and treble was a bit clearer and sounded very good.My only gripe now is I want this exact cable in smaller sizes to re run my some of my different applications and I can't seem to find this exact cable in smaller sizes. They do have some different style cables in smaller sizes but not this exact same one, I want the exact same cable that's in the 100 ft just in smaller sizes.I didn't find it when I looked for them.If they are available in smaller sizes and are exactly like the 100ft cable let me know please because this 100ft style cable sounded very well and I wanna run more of these exact cables in smaller sizes. Good cable and sound quality too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In the world of audio cables there is a minimum of necessary function and then there are infinite upgrades. There are plenty of fancier cables than these but these do exactly what I need them to do. I have a podcasting studio set up in a spare bedroom. I record both audio and video. I have a couple of RØDE NTG2's and an Audio Technica 2040 for guests. None of these are high-end performance premium mics. They are all pretty darn good and more than enough to record a podcast and have it sound professional. At my level I am not able to hear the difference in cables between this and the other budget cables I purchased from Sweetwater (who I love).Knowing what cable goes to what source is an important usability factor. These stand out and have springs on common wear points. Granted, my studio is not nearly as hard on equipment as being on the road would be. These will never mechanically wear out in my house. Overall, I like it, it does everything I could ask of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with the quality
reviews.reviewText: I wish all our cable were of this quality. We're talking durable heavy weight construction. I could not notice any loss of signal with this cable which is not the case with some 100ft length cables. We run this cable from the mixing board to the back of the room speakers and are very impressed with the quality with the sound of this cable. I'm a big fan of the spring shield as I feel it gives extra protection and support. The colored cable really helps in being to be visible so they don't get tripped over. In short, I would put this cable up against any of our other high priced name brands. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well constructed cable at a reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: I got the 100 foot style. It's an XLR cable, female connection on one end and male connection on the other. I will use this to daisy chain a set of powered speakers to get better spacing. This could also work well in a permanent setup for a Microphone running into a mixer in an adjacent room. There's spring relief at each end and the quality of the connectors is good. In a brief audio test, the sound quality was fine, with no hum. Several velcro strips are included for tieing the cable off. Nice cable at a good price point !!

Para Uso en Sistemas de Microfoneo a larga distancia con Boom , y para receptores de Senheisser a larga distancia de la grabadora, excelente calidad de transmisión y flujo sin retroalimentación ni "ruido blanco o rosa" de fondo.
